menu.title: Rack of lamb
menu.descr: Rack of lamb - class part of the carcass, which makes very appetizing, tasty and very tender dishes. Usually, the loin is served in one piece, which consists of 7-8 ribs.

menu.title: Crispy southern fried chicken
menu.descr: Crispy southern fried chicken - Such a chicken, even in its raw form, looks many times neater and tastier. Fantastically crispy, slightly spicy crust, under which tender meat hides

menu.title: Fried octopus with strawberries'
menu.descr: Fried octopus is a delicious appetizer that seafood lovers will especially like. Octopus meat itself is tasteless, however, if you use a marinade, the taste of the snack changes completely.

menu.title: Antipasta with prosciutto
menu.descr: Antipasta is a traditional Italian light appetizer before pasta. As a rule, it contains only a few components that are harmonious in taste.
